titles.title: To prohibit the transportation of certain volatile crude oil by rail.
To prohibit the transportation of certain volatile crude oil by rail.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary:
This bill prohibits any transportation by rail of crude oil with a Reid vapor pressure level greater than 8.5 psi until the Department of Transportation (DOT) establishes an appropriate national standard for the maximum volatility of crude oil to be permitted to be shipped by rail.
DOT shall establish such a national standard, after which the 8.5 psi standard required by this Act shall expire.
